arts.ttl: Burkardt brace the difference as Mainz oust Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Sunday's action in the Bundesrepublik got underway with the meeting of Mainz and TSG Hoffenheim. In the end, a first-half brace from Jonathan Burkardt sealed a 2-0 win for the hosts.

arts.ttl: Mainz vs Hoffenheim preview: Pivotal mid table clash
arts.sum: In a pivotal midtable clash, Mainz welcome Hoffenheim to Mewa Arena on Sunday for their 12th match of the season.

arts.ttl: Basara Mainz: Why a former Leicester City star is running a Japanese club in the heart of Germany
arts.sum: In the summer of 2024, Shinji Okazaki retired from playing professional football, but stayed in the sport as head coach of German sixth division club Basara Mainz. There, the 38-year-old not only...

arts.ttl: Preview: Mainz 05 vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Mainz 05 and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
